archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.3.1: Virtual instances (e.g. virtual servers, virtual desktops and containers) should be deployed, configured securely and maintained in accordance with documented standards/procedures.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
